Name: A Last Will and TESTament: Horror adventure
About the game: ABOUT A Last Will and Testament is first person adventure horror game in escape room style with lots of puzzles to solve. Fulfill the last will and find a testament. FEATURES 100 Steam Achievements hidden in the haunted house! Find it! Story & voice-over Two endings (normal and really, really secret ending) Beatiful and creepy graphic Creepy haunted house ambience and music Puzzles Length of the game: 2-4 hours Good optimization Hot price Save/load game any time Autosave Keyboard and mouse or gamepad controls 29 langauges Options (graphics, audio, configure controls, invert y-axis, subtitles, mouse/gamepad sensitivity etc.) Notes Linux, Windows and Mac OS support All resolution supports (21:9, Ultrawide etc.) Steam clouds Steam remote (TV, phone etc.) Not for the faint-hearted
